title: Hard facts, real talk and no beating around the bush
contentPreview: Straight to the facts, no sugar-coating, and no confusing terms. Term that is confusing, controversial, or has multiple interpretations has to be defined explicitly when used in an entry.
content: Straight to the facts, no sugar-coating, and no confusing terms. Term that is confusing, controversial, or has multiple interpretations has to be defined explicitly when used in an entry.
